title: ðŸš¨ NFL Schedule Release Instant Reaction: Analyzing Thanksgiving, MNF, SNF & other notable matchups (Football 5/7)
description:
Another quarantine news gift came Thursday night in the form of the NFL schedule release. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough team up to dissect all angles of the 2020 NFL slate. The Pick Six Superfriends examine notables like the season opener between the Texans and Chiefs (5:20), a rare Friday Christmas Day matchup between the Vikings and Saints (12:10) and the traditional 3-game slate on Thanksgiving (18:35). They also go over the primetime schedule (27:00), and decide the best and worst games set for Week 1 (44:30), Monday Night Football (50:30), Sunday Night Football (56:30) and Thursday Night Football (1:02:30), with some Saturday football insight mixed in. What are the games you won't want to miss? The crew has you covered with this instant reaction.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @JohnBreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
